name: Puzzlie lost in Snobball
description:
Puzzlie lost in Snobball 

Puzzlie lost in Snobball is a puzzle game where Puzzlie (a woolly curvy creature) 
has to try to reach the exit in every level.
To reach the exit, Puzzlie must defeat different Snobs. Just because they are blocking the road.

So you have different Snobs colors: The blue, red and pink Snobs. 
You can beat the blue Snobs with the blue sword. The pink with the pink sword
and the red with the red sword.
Actually very simple, but they are not all that simple to get. 
If Puzzlie has cleared the way to the exit, he can go to the next level.
It is also possible that the exit is locked, so that Puzzlie must first grab a key before the exit opens.

Can you help Puzzlie through the levels ......

Controls

Arrow Keys - Character movement
R - Reset
ESC - Exit
